props.title: Your Best Customers Deserve More
props.description: Restaurants thrive when they own their online ordering system. Here's why your best customers—and your business—benefit.

items.title: Bigger Orders, Higher Revenue
items.description: Customers ordering directly often place larger orders, perfect for celebrations, luncheons, or family meals.

image.alt: Illustration representing bigger orders and higher revenue.

items.title: Plan Ahead for Special Occasions
items.description: Advance orders provide opportunities to cater to loyal customers who trust you.

image.alt: Illustration representing planning ahead for special occasions.

items.title: Reach Customers Wherever They Are
items.description: Some of your best customers can't visit your restaurant in person—delivery ensures they never miss out.

image.alt: Illustration representing reaching customers via delivery.

items.title: Build Stronger Relationships
items.description: Owning your ordering channel lets you deliver a seamless, branded experience that builds customer loyalty.

image.alt: Illustration representing building stronger customer relationships.

props.title: Stop Overpaying for Reservations -Break Free from Monthly Fees and High Commissions Costs
props.description: Helping Restaurants Save More on Reservations While Driving More Sales, Every Day with Pricing that Makes Sense.

props.sectionTitle: An Affordable Reservation System Without the Catch

items.title: Low-Cost, Usage-Based Pricing
items.description: Only pay for the reservations you take.

items.title: Grow Revenue With Every Booking
items.description: Turn reservations into repeat visits with built-in customer engagement tools.

items.title: Designed for Restaurants Like Yours:
items.description: Tailored solutions for every stage of your business.

props.title: Built for Restaurants of Every Kind
props.description: Whether you're transitioning from pen and paper or escaping costly subscriptions, Oddle Reserve is made to fit your needs.

items.imageAlt: Dim sum dishes on a table representing traditional restaurants
items.title: Traditional Restaurants Going Digital
items.description: Facing digitalization challenges with the next generation stepping in, but hesitant about costly subscriptions? Oddle Reserve's pay-as-you-go model makes the transition seamless, eliminating steep monthly fees.

items.imageAlt: Exterior of a soup restaurant representing high walk-in restaurants
items.title: Restaurants With High Walk-Ins
items.description: With many walk-ins and limited online reservations, managing big group bookings can be challenging. Oddle Reserve's usage-based pricing lets you pay only when you need it, making it an ideal solution for occasional but essential online reservations.

items.imageAlt: Interior of a PizzaExpress restaurant representing restaurants on marketplaces
items.title: Restaurants On High-Commission Marketplaces
items.description: Paying expensive per cover to marketplaces that intercept direct bookings with ads can be frustrating. Oddle Reserve removes commissions and charges only per booking—not per cover—giving you back control of your reservations.

props.title: Simplify your day-to-day Operations with Powerful Views and Real-time Control.
props.description: User-friendly and seamless, Oddle Reserve simplifies the reservation process with advanced table management and management tools. It helps you efficiently manage reservations in real time, enhancing the dining experience and streamlining operations.

items.title: List View
items.description: Get a clear overview of all your reservations at a glance.

items.title: Timeline View
items.description: Visualize your bookings chronologically for better planning.

items.title: Table View
items.description: Manage table assignments and statuses efficiently.

items.title: Mobile View
items.description: Access and manage reservations on the go from any device.

items.title: Secure and Reliable Reservation Booking System
items.description: Ensure serious bookings and minimize no-shows with built-in safeguards.
items: Card Guarantee: Secure reservations with credit card guarantees to reduce cancellations.
Payment Request: Collect deposits or full payments upfront for high-value or busy periods.
Automated Customer Confirmation: Confirm reservations automatically to save time and reduce manual work.
items.imageAlt: Secure Reservation System Features

items.title: Customer-Friendly Features
items.description: Enhance the guest experience with convenient and flexible options.
items: Guest Self-Edit Reservations: Allow guests to change or cancel bookings without the need to call, creating a smoother experience.
Automated Status Management: Easily update and track reservation statuses with minimal effort, keeping your team aligned and operations seamless.
items.imageAlt: Customer Friendly Features

props.title: Turn every visit into a loyal customer

props.title: How restaurants grow using Oddle
props.description: Capture customer data and automate engagement to drive repeat visits.

items.imageAlt: Phone showing successful check-in for loyalty program
items.title: Capture Every Customer
items.description: Sign up diners in a flash, whether at the table or counter. with QR Scans or NFC Taps. The sleek, frictionless process that ensures you capture data from every guest, empowering you to deliver smarter, more personalized loyalty experiences.

items.tag: Keep your Restuarant Top of Mind
items.imageAlt: Phone showing loyalty reward notification
items.title: Automate Engagement
items.description: Automate personalized rewards, birthday offers, reminders for unused redeemables, and even customer feedback after visits. Stay top of mind while saving time and driving repeat visits with ease.

props.title: Transform every Payment Into a Growth Opportunity
props.description: More than just card processing at competitive rates, we empower you with insightful customer data and ways to grow revenue, all in one mobile device.

props.title: Next-gen solutions designed to help you grow revenue

items.title: Capture 100% of customers, no marketing opt-in needed
items.description: Advanced analytics drives data-driven decisions, offering predictive insights, personalized recommendations, real-time analysis, cost savings, and risk mitigation. Choose advanced analytics for strategic decision-making and business growth.
items.imageAlt: Analytics dashboard showing customer data

items.title: Get a true health score on customer retention
items.description: Move beyond revenue tracking to understand your restaurant's customer health. By capturing a unique profile for each visitor, you'll see an accurate score of your customer retention rates, providing a clear snapshot of how often guests return and the strength of their loyalty.
items.imageAlt: Graph showing customer retention score

items.title: Collect contacts, boost database marketing
items.description: Effortlessly grow your contact list when customers claim redeemables by scanning a QR code on their receipt. Once added, you can send targeted updates, exclusive offers, or online store promotions to keep your restaurant top of mind.
items.imageAlt: Phone scanning QR code on receipt

items.title: Drive return visits with targeted redeemables
items.description: Encourage repeat business with tailored redeemables. Set thresholds, like spending minimums, to trigger exclusive return offers that bring customers back, keeping them engaged and driving loyalty.
items.imageAlt: Phone showing loyalty redeemable offer

items.title: Dedicated Customer Support
items.description: Our team is always ready to help, ensuring your business stays up and running.

items.title: 48-hour Onboarding
items.description: Get started with Oddle Terminal within 2 business days—quick, easy, and hassle-free.

items.title: Reliable Connectivity Anywhere
items.description: With an sim in every device, enjoy stable internet for transactions, even in remote locations.
